attributes.action: Give free gym/leisure centre admission to the overweight or those with health difficulties.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many people who are overweight struggle to exercise because of the costs involved with using a gym or leisure centre, there are many excellent courses available but they are usually expensive and out of the question for most people. 
Those who would benefit from more excercise, such as people with health troubles or those who are overweight should be allowed free access to gyms this will be a cost to the goverment but it will also reduce NHS cost as it will give people the chance to change thier lifestyle.
